title: Twitter tests 'notes' feature with 2,500 word limit
description: The trial will allow some users to share "notes" beyond the normal 280-character limit for tweets.

title: Meta board hears over a million appeals over removed posts
description: The Oversight Board, which oversees Facebook and Instagram, said only 47 were submitted by Meta itself.

title: Chinese man jailed for sexual assault of Alibaba employee on work trip
description: The woman was assaulted after being made to drink on a work trip, and then fired after going public.

title: NHS warns of scam Covid-test texts
description: Fake messages tell recipients they have been in contact with a Covid case and should order a test.
